vignette.name: Tutorials
vignette.bodytext: Tutorials are designed to be read within Max, so you can experiment with the patch that accompanies the text. At the top of each tutorial is an open the tutorial link that you can use to open the accompanying patch. Or, you can click the Open Patcher button in the documentation window toolbar. The Open Patcher button will only be enabled if the tutorial or other document has an accompanying patcher.
